alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 17 at 3:07AM EST until December 19 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, additional snow accumulations of a coating to two inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 or more inches possible in the most persistent snow bands. * WHERE...Hamilton County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Expect hazardous travel due to snow covered and slippery roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest lake effect snow totals are expected to occur across western portions of the county.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
